data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadio Artemio Franchi have now been confirmed.
Fiorentina kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 2, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Sampdoria.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Florence, Federico Chiesa of Fiorentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 8, Christian Kouame for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Piero Giacomelli awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 10, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Antonio Candreva (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fiorentina's Dusan Vlahovic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Fiorentina just outside Sampdoria's area.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Gaston Ramirez for the away team is judged to be offside.
Important block from the Fiorentina defence as Gaston Ramirez fires in a strike for Sampdoria.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria's Antonio Candreva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
In the minute 23, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) gets a yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Florence to check on Martin Caceres, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 26, Fiorentina's Martin Caceres looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sampdoria pushes forward through Antonio Candreva, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Florence Fiorentina attack through Federico Chiesa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Piero Giacomelli awards the home team a throw-in.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Sampdoria.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Antonio Candreva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sampdoria.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Sampdoria.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sampdoria drive upfield and Mikkel Damsgaard gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
In the minute 37, Giacomo Bonaventura of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Florence, Gaston Ramirez (Sampdoria) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 39, Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria drives towards goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina's Gaetano Castrovilli attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
An attacking Sampdoria player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
It's advantage Sampdoria in Florence as Fabio Quagliarella scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
In the minute 44, Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Giacomo Bonaventura gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Sampdoria kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Fiorentina's Federico Chiesa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 48, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 50, Fabio Quagliarella of Sampdoria gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 51, Sampdoria push forward at Stadio Artemio Franchi and Antonio Candreva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria are pushing forward but Tommaso Augello's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 52, Piero Giacomelli awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 55, Sampdoria drive into the zone and Antonio Candreva is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 56, Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Martin Caceres (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina drives forward and Gaetano Castrovilli gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Dusan Vlahovic of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 58, The home team replace Christian Kouame with Patrick Cutrone.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
In the minute 59, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Martin Caceres (Fiorentina) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In the minute 62, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Fiorentina will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sampdoria.
Sampdoria drives forward and Gaston Ramirez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Sampdoria pushes forward through Antonio Candreva, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Dusan Vlahovic's header is off-target for Fiorentina.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Sampdoria's area.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 67, Dusan Vlahovic (Fiorentina) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Sampdoria’s Antonio Candreva and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 68, Antonio Candreva returns to the field for Sampdoria after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 69, Valerio Verre is replacing Mikkel Damsgaard for the away team.
It seems as if Antonio Candreva is unable to continue. Mehdi Leris replaces him for the away team.
The away team have replaced Gaston Ramirez with Kristoffer Askildsen. This is the third substitution made today by Claudio Ranieri.
Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Dusan Vlahovic gets an equalizer for Fiorentina. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Nikola Milenkovic to set up the goal.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Sampdoria.
At Stadio Artemio Franchi, Albin Ekdal has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 75, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 78, Fiorentina's Federico Chiesa breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 80, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 82, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gaetano Castrovilli.
Giuseppe Iachini (Fiorentina) is making a second change, with Alfred Duncan replacing the possibly injured Gaetano Castrovilli.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Valerio Verre gives Sampdoria a 1-2 lead.
Emil Audero with an assist there.
In the minute 84, Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria) is making a fourth substitution, with Vasco Regini replacing Tommaso Augello.
Antonio Palumbo is on a sub for Albin Ekdal for Sampdoria.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Federico Chiesa (Fiorentina) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 86, Patrick Cutrone (Fiorentina) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Piero Giacomelli awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Riccardo Saponara is replacing Sofyan Amrabat for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
In Florence Sampdoria attack through Antonio Palumbo. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
So close for Fiorentina as Federico Chiesa's shot comes back off the post.
The match has come to a close in Florence. The final score is 1-2.
